title: (30510) Yecla - 21C Calle de Valencia
description: Water has low pressure but it works, toalet is clean and free. Repsol gas station open 6.00 to 22.00.

title: (30510) Yecla - 51 Calle de la Rambla
description: Laundromat in Yecla plus dryer.

title: (30510) Yecla - 31D Avenida Literato Azorín
description: Street behind the hospital, much quieter than the next avenue, on the main avenue and offering the same services on the other side of the park, ideal for children.

title: (30510) Yecla - 23 Avenida Feria
description: Large street with parking available. In front of the Guardia Civil supermarket and Aldi. Bus stop nearby Outside the trade fair, parking is also available at the trade fair car park. Public toilet in the bus station. Several bars. Park and fantastic children's playground.

title: (30510) Yecla - 21D Camino Castillo
description: 1 place for van (not bigger)

title: (30510) Yecla - 21D Camino Castillo
description: Large parking espalier, both of the bottom are relatively flat. Located next to the cemetery and sports center.

title: (30510) Yecla - Camino de la Anchura
description: Parking spaces on asphalt. Complete supply and disposal. Separate taps for cassette cleaning and drinking water. Taps without thread. The parking space is next to a playground and a skate park. The young trees still offer little shade. The city center is 2km away.

title: (30510) Yecla - Paraje Fuente del Pinar, A-14
title_short: (30510) Yecla - Paraje Fuente del Pinar, A-14
description: Park very nice and quiet, surrounded by nature with a magnificent view of the mountain landscape, 200 square meter plots and the direct starting point for hiking and mountain biking.

title: (02660) Caudete - Unnamed Road
description: Secluded area, very quiet and next to a climbing area with very easy access.

title: (30510) Arabí -
description: Ecological vineyards and winery. 500000 meters of vineyards for walks. Parking for 4 motorhomes only. Organic wine tasting. Observations of work in vineyards. Learning wine making. Barbecue service. Short stays from 3 to 7 days. Optional excursion to Mount El Arabi - World Heritage Site - protected by UNESCO. Only visits booked online. Prohibited entry with children and dogs, pets.

title: (03657) Yecla - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place, up high with fantastic views over the Yecla valley. Could only get one third of the way up the hill in our 5.7 mtr. Level plot. Spent 2 nights with no problem.

title: (03657) Yecla - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador, viewpoint, 1150 meters high, 4G, magnificent view, path to place 100 meters moderate, very quiet. No service.

title: (02660) Caudete - 23 Calle la Zafra
description: Very cheap laundry with dryers. Very fast.

title: (02660) Caudete - Avenida de Villena
description: Parking to rest one night in transit. It has shade to get up without stress due to the heat and there is a fountain. It also has a wooded park for children on the other side of the road.

title: (03657) Yecla - Unnamed Road
description: In the Sierra de Salinas, a very quiet place with several walking routes that start there. site without coverage. I have spent several nights and have had no problems.

title: (02660) Caudete - 70 Calle San Jaime
description: Newly constructed gray water and freshwater extraction point (Gardena connection); bins available

title: (30520) Jumilla - Unnamed Road
description: After 1 km of track, just after the exit, small horizontal esplanade next to the track, 50 m from the pass on the right. If you see a mini rikiki chapel, it's 100 m before!

title: (30510) Yecla - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking near Cantos de Visera. there is a cool cave and hiking trails. no services.

title: (30510) Arabí -
description: Quiet parking lot. Starting point for hikes on Monte Arabí. No cell phone reception.

name: Nomading Camp
title: (03409) Nomading Camp
description: Camping The Ball. Interior of the white coast

title: (30528) Fuente del Pino - 58 Aldea Fuente del Pino
title_short: (30528) Fuente del Pino - 58 Aldea Fuente del Pino
description: Quiet place to stop for a while to rest. Very calm.

title: (03409) Villena - Vias Verdes del Xixarra
description: A picnic area with chairs and tables ideal for stretching the legs and for the little ones to run and vent. Wooded with lots of shade. You could still sleep, but we haven't.

name: Vista Montana
title: (03638) Vista Montana
description: Close by (400 m) a small village with mountains all around, weekly markets on Tuesdays, Fridays and Saturdays. There are also several bars and restaurants, a mini supermarket, butchers and bakers in the village. Dutch owners. Lots of opportunities for walking and cycling. This is a lovely quiet place with beautiful views, yet close to the village. Also plenty of room for large motorhomes ( 12m) Feel free to drop by!

title: (03400) Villena - Autovía de Alicante
description: Service station parking and restaurant, cafe, open 24/24. Bathroom. No service for motorhome. Maybe possibility of having water at the station, asking for it. Good for a lunch stop or a night.

title: (03400) Villena - 1A Partida Emilia P Bazán
description: Flat clearing. habitual parking of the neighbors. widely used to sleep by those who go by van to the concerts that take place in the nearby bullring

title: (03400) Villena - 4 Calle Vinalopo
description: Quiet place for one night and keep going

title: (03400) Villena - 27 Calle Rosalía Castro
description: A parking lot ideally located for visiting the castle. next to this site is the Granada restaurant bar which offers a delicious menu .

title: (03400) Villena - 18 Calle Rosalía Castro
description: Parking next to each other. Land of land where you can park and spend the night. Noisy and very frequented by dogs whose owners don't bother to pick up anything.

title: (03400) Villena - 4 Calle San Juan
description:
Closed to Road and near to other parkplace, its above mainroad but hardly noisy waves car.
i think weekends Will be busy With teen drinking but its safer than other and shadowy and tablets to relax.
good place to start different hikes and ferratas among the rock.

title: (03400) Villena - Calle Calvario
description: Parking with views of the sunset and the Atalaya castle. Next to the mountain, the start of the Via Ferrata route. You have the city at 1min. Quiet area with viewpoints and picnic area.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 19 Calle del Taller
description: This is an unmade hard standing area on the edge of an unfinished development. It was recommended by the tourist office as they are hoping to develop it as a Motorhome area. Several bodegas and a castle to visit. Plenty of bars and restaurants in this friendly town!

title: (03400) Villena - 1 Carretera Alicante
description: Washing of motorhomes with ladder

name: Camp El Tranquilo - Camp Pinoso
title: (03657) Camp El Tranquilo - Camp Pinoso
description:
The 42 segregated pitch Touring park open 365 days is located in a small hamlet just outside the quaint traditional town of Pinoso (El Pinos), on the Valencian / Murcia border the area is scattered with many working hamlets which are rich in history and strong in cultural traditions. Fiestas are many and some continue for days.
The Adult only site is Tranquil, very peaceful and above all quiet we are surrounded by Olive and Almond groves as well as acres and acres of vineyards, also dotted around us are orange and lemon trees.

title: (03639) Sax - 7 Plaza Santa Eulalia
description: Ideal for overnight in caravan. Very quiet place.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 3 Calle Ingeniero de la Cierva
title_short: (30520) Jumilla - 3 Calle Ingeniero de la Cierva
description: Covered swimming pool parking. tall and flat. Lots of noise from the garbage trucks parked in the city's technical services premises and come out day and night.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 0 Avenida de la Libertad
description: Vacant lot with lots of space. To see if it is sometimes busy. Good for going into town but a bit far from the center. I stayed for a few hours but I would not spend the night

title: (03639) Sax - 211 Plaça Poligono 2
description: Pine forest before entering the district of Santa Eulalia. Near the highway.

title: (03400) Sax - 216 Plaza Santa Eulalia
description: It is a gas station with a rest area with a shower. When you enter the first impression is very good, then I saw hair in the drain and I thought maybe they just used it recently. My discontent comes when the water does not come out hot and when I have commented on it, they have been indifferent

title: (03650) Pinoso - 1 Calle Isabel la Catolica
description: Large parking lot right on the edge of this nice town. Bar with tapas right beside. We did not stay the night because we were at el tranquilo.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 93A Calle Nuestra Sr Asunción Par
title_short: (30520) Jumilla - 93A Calle Nuestra Sr Asunción Par
description: Quiet, large open area next to a school and empty field, close to a restaurant.  Short walk to town center or Mercadona.

title: (03650) Pinoso - 23 Calle Cánovas del Castillo
description: Very flat parking in the center of Pinoso

name: Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
title: (03630) Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
title_short: (03630) Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
description: Association of Campo Alegre Camping Friends. Various accommodations and campsites where our partners, to contribute of the conservation , can stay in our beautiful place with many services and facilities in the countryside just 3 kilometers from the village of Sax. Many hiking and cycling routes available! Call or whatsapp  recommended.

name: Área recreativa El Plano
title: (03639) Área recreativa El Plano
description: Large parking lot next to the grove. There are picnic tables under the trees, restrooms, grills. There is a paved walkway that gives access to some of the tables. There is a large campsite, but vehicles cannot access it. There are also swings and a playground for children. The toilets were closed every time we stopped in the winter.

title: (03650) Pinoso - 13D Diseminado Pinoso
description: Parking near sport facilities in El Pinoso. Just a short walk to the center. Nice walking boulevard. Close to bodega.

title: (30520) Jumilla - Camino Viejo de Santa Ana
title_short: (30520) Jumilla - Camino Viejo de Santa Ana
description: Place in the middle of nature, 750 meters high, 4G, no water, no service. Jumillia at 10 km. Very calm

title: (03650) Els Purgatés - 39 Partida Cabezo
description: Be careful because it goes up very very steep we were in first place almost all the way however a splendid view only one place please leave clean

title: (03630) Sax - 17 Camino Cantera
description: Open field daily level overlooking town lots of dog walking but here on a Saturday,fairly peaceful 10 minutes walk up road is picnic area town only down the road for supply,had no disturbances and very clean no water or electric

title: (30520) Jumilla -
description:
3 days MAX STAY. if staying longer you need to get permission from town council 

Recreational area in Santa Ana. There is a sign of camping area and parking. The place is spectacular. There are garbage containers, fountain, tables and benches and barbecues (although I do not think you can fire). The place is super quiet and there is plenty of space to park. At about 300m there is a monastery where you can visit a museum. On the side of the monastery there is another small place with a source of spring water.

title: (30520) - 68 Diseminado Santa Ana
description: Turn off the road onto a dirt road.  4x4 or at least a vehicle with plenty of ground clearance would be better. Then after a hundred meters there is a small area on the left, slightly sloping, a little difficult to drive on.  Then a very quiet and sheltered place. No service, but many hiking trails in the area.

title: (02640) Almansa - 233 Calle Diseminado
description: Incredible place to spend the night ... very, very quiet, there are several parking lots. Both dirt and asphalt.

title: (02640) Almansa - 1 Calle Valle Inclán
description: Parking day and night very quiet and central.

title: (02640) Almansa - 11 Calle Valle Inclán
description: Parking in cord very close to the fairground and downtown. Also close to a parking lot although there is a nearby pub in this car park and the seats are not large. In the vicinity of the fairgrounds there is a lot of parking in general. There is a park with playgrounds 100 meters away. It is highly recommended to visit the castle and the museum of the Battle of Almansa.

title: (46630) La Font de la Figuera -
description: Good for a lunch break or to spend the night, close to the highway but quiet, restaurant next door

title: (02640) Almansa - 1 Plaza Primero de Mayo
description: Parking of the bus station, 2 places emptying the water (gray and black) and the water charge

title: (02640) Almansa - 37 Plaza Primero de Mayo
description: Free water fountain in the park

title: (03630) Sax - Nº5 Avenida Historia Bernardo Herr
title_short: (03630) Sax - Nº5 Avenida Historia Bernardo Herr
description: Laundry small, medium, large and dry. there is also pet gap

title: (03658) les Enzebres - 11 Carretera Encebras
description: Small town with a typical bar, route area to the three sources

title: (02640) Almansa - 164 Calle San Antonio
description: Wash (detergent included). Coins only. No change of currency. Electrical outlets available.

title: (03400) Villena - 179 Urbanización Penarrubia
description: Last urban village, start of the Peñarrubia trail

title: (02640) Almansa -
description: Another area in the Almansa Reservoir, on the side of the road. Super quiet.

title: (03630) Sax - 7 Calle Rey Don Jaime I
title_short: (03630) Sax - 7 Calle Rey Don Jaime I
description: Very good area to spend the night, quiet and bright, and with all the services of the town, bars, bakery, etc etc,

title: (02640) Almansa - 14 Calle San Juan
description: Parking municipal pool. Very central and quiet. Garbage service Bars around and 100 meters from the center.

title: (02640) Almansa -
description: Parking 50m from the lake under coniferous trees. Very nice, quiet and clean (low season). Picnic tables and trash cans are also provided. A bit bumpy path, but doable.

title: (02640) Almansa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot of recreational area next to artificial lake. nice tables in the trees. lake good for a swim.

title: (02640) Almansa - 10 Calle Artista Carmen Morell
description: At 100 meters on the Paseo las Huertas, 55, there is the Bar Pedro y Coque cafe, you eat very well, I recommend it

title: (02640) Almansa - 7 Calle Ramón J Sender
description: We parked one night the police passed by and they didn't say anything to us, the place is very close to a Burger King and the castle of Almansa, the place is a bit noisy during the day because a lot of traffic passes by but at night it is very acceptable it is well lit. It gives you a feeling of great security.

title: (02640) Almansa - 9999 Calle Diseminado
description: Embalse de Almansa in Albacete is a parking lot where you can walk around the reservoir, but it seems like an area because it is very convenient to spend the night there.

title: (02640) Almansa - Calle Escritora Alicia Jiménez Barlett
title_short: (02640) Almansa - Calle Escritora Alicia Jiménez Barlett
description:
Quiet street with diagonal battery parking spaces.
No traffic, close to Burger King and a walk from the castle.

title: (02640) Almansa - Pk 143 Autovía de Alicante
description: A huge parking lot next to a supermarket and gas station, off the highway

name: El Chico Rubio
title: (03640) El Chico Rubio
description: Introduction... We are Jaap and Kim. With our son Brent, we emigrated to Spain in December 2021 to fulfill our dream. We now run a small scale glamping site with luxury tents between olive and almond trees! If you want to relax and not camp, we also have a deluxe studio, which is equipped for up to 4 people. Of course it is also possible to stay with your motorhome. Beautiful places with wide views in the middle of mountains and olive groves Enjoy nature and relax! Ideal place for walks, motorbike rides and bike rides. The village of Monóvar is 2 km away. Supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, etc. can be reached in 5 to 10 minutes by bike. Facilities: Swimming pool 12 x 6 (unheated) Breakfast service Luxurious sanitary facilities Dishwasher Electricity Spacious pitches Pets accepted on a leash. Reservation by phone or app!

title: (46630) La Font de la Figuera -
description: Quiet parking for the night and a very good restaurant next door

title: (46630) Fuente la Higuera - 1C Passeig Vicente Rojo
title_short: (46630) Fuente la Higuera - 1C Passeig Vicente Rojo
description: A small tranquil place where you can stop for a moment if you need a break or want to eat something, there is a playground and a beautiful view.

title: (46630) La Font de la Figuera - Avenue 9 Octubre
title_short: (46630) La Font de la Figuera - Avenue 9 Octubre
description: Very quiet place to park and spend the night. On Sunday in the town square, a 5-minute walk away, there is a typical market, bars and a supermarket next to the parking lot in the public summer pool for 2.5 euros with showers and there is a court. paddle, pediment, free gym and all year with pay showers, there is a large wine cellar to visit in the village ethnological museum and very good hiking trails of 2 to 3 hours maximum

title: (03630) Sax - 27 Partida Zapatera
description: Cozy and quiet place. Easy access with Madrid-Alicante motorway exit. Idyllic place for weekends, bridges or holidays as it is located in a strategic point 25 minutes from the sea and 15 minutes from a golf course. It is located in the heart of nature with large plots and large shaded and sunny spaces to choose from. It has 10 motorhome pitches and 30 motorhome parking spots. Please call at least 2 hours before your arrival.

title: (03410) Biar - 1 Calle Castelleros
description:
New Biar Motorhome Area,
near the center to visit Castle and the town where we can see its streets and pass the Banana tree one of the largest specimens in the country. natural landscapes with routes for hiking, biking and climbing areas, etc.
Views of the Sierra del Fraile
Quiet place, 8 regulation places, all services
Thanks to the City of Biar
let's respect the environment

title: (03410) Biar - 2 Carretera de Biar a Bañeres
title_short: (03410) Biar - 2 Carretera de Biar a Bañeres
description: Level picnic area and very quiet, very good views of the Biar castle. Perfect for overnight.

title: (03410) Biar - 3 Calle Josefa Aynat Amorós
description: Parking without service perfect for visiting this pretty city, quiet for the night.

title: (03410) Biar - 7A Calle Pasos
description: It is a public car park next to the old town of Biar. To one side there is a landscaped park with games for children and an area for walking. And on the other side we have views of the surrounding mountains and the castle.

title: (30529) Jumilla - 8 Diseminado Estrecho de Marin
description: Picnic area night possible wine cellar face

title: (03640) El Ravalet - 2 Plaza la Rosaleda
description: Spacious and level place at the entrance of Monóvar. Perfect for spending the night or visiting the town. In the square there is a restaurant and nearby a gas station and a supermarket.

name: Finca Guillermo Murcia
title: (30529) Finca Guillermo Murcia
description: Shaded parking in front of our b&b, in the middle of nature! Beautiful pool available, extremely quiet! Starting point for beautiful walks, centrally located. (lots of bodegas). Only delicious breakfast at 10 euros / pp obligatory to take and possibility to take dinner by chef Wim. Electricity connection 5 euros. Own drinks and snacks are not allowed in the b&b! In June-July-August-September, pool access 10 euros per person per day.

title: (03410) Biar - 2 Diseminado Santuario
description: Quiet land parking, nearby there is a hermitage with views of Biar and a beautiful sunset.

title: (03600) Elda - 4 Calle Lieja
description:
Parking on street that has not been developed yet.(typically Spanish)
Very secure with lighting and a few local cars.
Easy walk into local bars.
Handy  if climbing at Sax or Marin.

title: (02652) Ontur - 297 CM-412
description: Magnificent newly opened motorhome area. Very close to the town. Right next to the pavilion and the municipal swimming pool. Thanks to the Ontur town hall for this great motorhome area.

title: (03600) Elda - 72 Avenida Camilo Jose Cela
description: Parking of the football field, without services, well lit at night, asphalt, leveled, quiet night without noise, a walk to the center of town, near a park with swings for children

title: (03610) Petrer - 14 Polígono Guirney-San Rafael
description: Parking day and night in the town of Petrer, close to a shopping center and carrefour. very quiet place at night

title: (03640) Elda - 6D Calle el Tope
description:
Stretch of barren land next to industrial estate and motocross track. Friday afternoon until Saturday afternoon there was no motocross. 
Reasonably quiet night, just a lot of barking dogs in the distance.

Not pretty, quite dusty, no shade, no services.

title: (03610) Petrer - 1A Carrer el Portal
description: Good place to spend the night, illuminated and close to areas of bars, restaurants, etc.

title: (46630) Fuente la Higuera - 6 A-35
description: Service area where it is possible to take a shower. Two showers available, a bit old but very clean. Very friendly staff.

title: (03610) Petrer - 10 Carrer del Campet
description: Public parking, next to the school touching the fence on the right are level, the others are a little inclined.

title: (03669) Alicante - 6 Lugar la Cruz
description: Just to spend the night and or visit La Romana

title: (03669) La Romana - 2 Calle San Isidro
description: In the center of the town. Quiet.

title: (03610) Petrer - 28 Carrer la Font
description: Free parking. Quiet place to sleep. It is in the old town of Petrer worth a visit

title: (03669) La Romana - 21 CV-842
description: Very sparsely populated village with a large car park where you can park and spend the night, very quiet area with very easy access to dirt tracks and hiking trails (on the same road before the detour to the village is a restaurant where you can eat traditional food and one of the best rice paellas with snails in the province)

title: (02691) Bonete - 15 Calle José Luis
description: A stop along the way to eat. Shaded next to park, with picnic tables.

title: (03410) Biar - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to spend the night and play sports. Narrow but paved road, with a motorhome you can park at the beginning of the climb if you do not see it clearly.

title: (46635) Fontanars dels Alforins - 1 Camino Naus Artesanals
title_short: (46635) Fontanars dels Alforins - 1 Camino Naus Artesanals
description: Parking next to the road, two minutes from the center of town. Very quiet area, surrounded by vineyards, absolute silence at night (the road with little traffic during the day and no traffic at night). Wineries, routes and great gastronomy, among them Casa Julio and La Caudalia.

title: (03610) Petrer - 83 Carrer de la Foia
description: Good parking lot to go up to the Castell in Petrer. Not suitable for the night as the national road runs right next to it.

title: (03610) Petrer - 32A Avinguda de la Llibertat
description: Uncovered parking for polygon workers. On weekends it is empty and during the week there will obviously be more cars. It is an open square, paved, without water or anything but to stop and rest for a while is fine

title: (03410) Biar - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with space for 2 or 3 vans. There are tables and recreation areas. Spectacular area, with lush forests, walking and cycling routes. It is accessed by a dirt road suitable for vans. No coverage.

title: (03610) Petrer - 1A Plaça la Molineta
description: Large public car parking on slight slope next to A31,some shade but ideal for a pit stop. Quiet except for road noise.

title: (30629) Sierra de La Pila - Unnamed Road
title_short: (30629) Sierra de La Pila - Unnamed Road
description: Nice recreational area, there is a natural water source below the picnic area, garbage cans available and the toilet block (currently closed) very quiet location nice parking area and also parking for people with reduced mobility

name: LACAVA
title: (03430) LACAVA
description: GAMPING "LA CUESTA" CV 802 km2 -Situated between the Nacional Parks of El Maigmo and La Sierra Mariola known for their natural year round beauty, walking trails, cycle routes, peace and tranquility and multiple fresh water springs. Secure parking, use of barbecue and seasonal use of swimming pool. Relax with open views across the valley to the Castle of Castalla.  Historic Bocairent, Alcoy, Biar and Pou Clar (Ontinyent) nearby.

title: (03660) Novelda - 153 CV-832
description: Parking of the Santuari of Santa Maria Magdalena in Novelda. Near the Restaurant La Mola. Magnificent view. Free point of water (not tap compatible hose, no Threading.) System setting D!) No size limit and places for large vehicles (see photos). The police made a few rounds but said nothing. Castle to visit but check his days depending on the season, for example closed Monday in August.

name: Camping Los Carasoles
title: (46811) Camping Los Carasoles
description: Camping Los Carasoles in the Sierra de Enguera. Isolated area with no cover to disconnect. Perfect for excursions and mountain biking. Next to the Fuente de las Arenas area. Not free!

name: Área de Autocaravanas | Alpera
title: (02690) Área de Autocaravanas | Alpera
description: Free and very spacious RV park, interesting for tourists. Located directly on a large park with water features and playgrounds. Toilets are available but locked, but a very nice family seems to live here and opens them on request. Really one of the cleanest and most beautiful places to rest and take care of. Electricity is hard to come by, but it's free.

title: (02690) Alpera - 44 Calle Templete
description: Very quiet parking space at a natural park of Alpera. Sun in the evening and in the morning.

title: (03430) Onil - 1 Carrer Jaume I
description: Motorhome area next to gas station and soccer field, with all services, quiet to sleep, starting point for the hiking route and visit town.

title: (46811) Enguera - 427 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Free camping area Fuente de las Arenas. with picnic areas, paelleros, fountain. It has a bar that opens on weekends and is a luxury, you can eat well. Passage of routes through nature, with many possibilities. In wild nature

title: (03430) Onil - 30 Avinguda de la Pau
description: Self-service laundry in the urban area of Onil and near the motorhome area.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Corral-Rubio
title: (02693) Área de Autocaravanas Corral-Rubio
description: Motorhome area with 15 parking spaces. Very new and attached to a public pool with a beach bar. Close to the soccer field and a step away from the town with all services.

title: (03610) Petrer -
description: Recreational area with barbecues (closed in winter). In the middle of nature, ideal for excursions on foot. In winter there is hardly anyone.

name: Finca Las Alegrias
title: (03688) Finca Las Alegrias
description:
We are Carlos and Emi and have followed our dream and found our little paradise in Spain.
We would like to share this with nice people.
Carlos likes to work with wood and recycled material and we try to reuse everything as much as possible.
There is still a lot to be made and all ideas are welcome.

We also have a picking garden from which we make our own limoncello and olive oil also from our own trees.
The dog playground is made of recycled wood and the roof of pallets.

Do you like to enjoy and use all this or maybe help yourself, you are very welcome with us.
You may use our sanitary facilities, swimming pool, and have 4 parking spaces for campers.
We also have a guest house for 2 persons for children of helping friends.
Dogs are of course welcome as long as they are friendly and socialised.

So if you would like to build with us or if you want to be creative or just relax and read a book, you can do this with us in the silence along the mountains of the Hondon Valley.

We charge a fee for the parking costs and you will have to pay for the electricity if you need it.
All other services are free.
Maximum length 8 meters
Please call if there is room.

Greetings Carlos & Emi

title: (03420) Castalla - 85 Avenida de Onil
description: Self-service laundry, with two washers and two dryers. Very neat and clean. Good prices.

title: (46640) - 2E Plaça Poligono 29
description: The rest area for motorhomes It is located on the 25-hectare farm La Bodega Casa Rural. Space destined exclusively for AC is surrounded by vineyards and olive groves. Privileged place overlooking the Cañoles river is an important viewpoint of a migratory pass. Fully guarded. No facilities only parking space. No chairs tables or cooking outside the camper.

title: (03420) Castalla - Calle Miguel Hernández
description: From the A-7 take exit 468/469 (depending on direction) and follow CV-815 to Castalla. Once there, follow signs to the sports center. The person who facilitates loading water and electrical connection is in charge of the Sports Center. Hotel services and shopping are in the town, about 400 m. And the gas station 500 m. Visit the castle, the House of Fester and not miss the Moors and Christians in early September.

name: J'S Oase
title: (03680) J'S Oase
description:
Beautiful pitch surrounded by vineyards in the mountains of Aspe.

Only possible with registration, as there is a limited number of places available.

title: (03610) Petrer - Carretera Agost
description: Picnic area with toilets. Natural environment and climbing area.

title: (03660) Novelda - 6A Carrer Elda
description: Unpaved area, we spent two very quiet nights, a little dirty due to dog feces. 10 min. walking from the center.

title: (03420) Castalla - CV-817
description: Xorret de Catí recreation area. Water, toilets and barbecues. There are a lot of people during vacation time but still there are some more remote places where one can spend the night and be further away from the recreation areas which tend to be full during the day.

title: (03450) Bañeres - 776 Partida Campo Oro
description: Quiet on the outskirts, flat, several camping pitches with a view of meadows and the national park. Trail entry.

title: (03109) Urbanització Terol -
description: Motorhome and Camper car area in Xorret del Catí.

title: (03430) Alicante - 7 Plaça 7
description: Recreation area near the village of Onil, with toilets and public water source. Tables and benches for eating, as well as a barbecue.

title: (03660) Novelda - 32 Carrer Alcalde Manuel Alberola
description: Laundry at 400m parking / night 12kg, 16kg dry 10min

title: (03660) Novelda - 2 Avenida Poeta Ausias March
description: Unpaved space with no restrictions. Close to the center. Mercadona right next door. There are other similar places on the same street. We stayed here one night and there were no problems.

title: (03420) Castalla - 1000 Lugar I Pd 3
description: Large car park attached to a busy road during the day. It is paved.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 898 Paratge Partida el Bovar
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 898 Paratge Partida el Bovar
description: Recreational area where you can spend the day, have a picnic, there are tables, a river to bathe etc ...

title: (03420) Castalla - CV-815
description: At Repsol gas station. Free non drinkable water on the right side. You can wash your van behind the station as well

name: Naturist Camping Sierra Natura Enguera
title: (46811) Naturist Camping Sierra Natura Enguera
description: Naturist campsite Sierra Natura. A truly special place, away from the crowds, imbued with tranquility, freedom and respect. The sites are separated from each other and scattered in nature. The buildings and the pool are very original and beautiful. On the road up the highway, there is a VERY closed and framed curve area in which caution is appropriate and you have to honk to be tracked. Prices are good.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 792 Partida Campo Oro
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 792 Partida Campo Oro
description: Moulin de l'Ombria. Camping and picnic area where you can spend the day but night prohibited. In spring and summer it is possible to use barbecues, toilets and other facilities free of charge.

title: (03660) Novelda - 2 Carrer la Serreta
description: Industrial Estate. Stood here on the weekend. Completely quiet and not far from the motorway. McDonalds for breakfast around the corner.

title: (03698) Agost -
description: Nice viewpoint With paragliding land ING

name: Finca La Montañosa
title: (03688) Finca La Montañosa
description: Bed and breakfast with room for 10 campers. Very well received by Dutch owners. There is also a restaurant with English speaking service

title: (03688) Hondón de las Nieves - 2 Calle San José
title_short: (03688) Hondón de las Nieves - 2 Calle San José
description: Parking space behind the Bodega in the village. Cozy village with shops and restaurants and terraces. Wednesday and Saturday street market from 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. Delicious wine tasting at Bodega and not expensive.

title: (03689) Fondó dels Frares - 12 CV-845
description: Gravel parking, slight slope, calm road in this month of May. no service. Very good for one night.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 22 Carrer de la Font Bona
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 22 Carrer de la Font Bona
description: Perfect esplanade for parking. Very close to the tourist office. There they perfectly explain the points of interest and they even have great guided tours to visit the most interesting parts of the town.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot on top of the hills with amazing views. It is an open place so when it’s windy you will be exposed. However for that same reason you can enjoy both sunset and sunrise from here. The road up from the CV-660 is concrete paved and on top of the hill it becomes a dirt road.

title: (30629) La Garapacha - 29 Aldea Garapacha
description: Parking at the foot of the access path to Via Ferrata la Garapacha

title: (03680) -
description: rest area with parking for bicycles. It is next to a not very busy road with benches and tables to sit on. The entrance is complicated for a motorhome or with a trailer (I think it has no water point) the ground is level and it is dirt

title: (02695) Villar de Chinchilla -
description: Dirt road that has some places where you can park with a 7.5m AC without problem. In the middle of nowhere, next to a very quiet road that has no traffic at night. We slept very well, sheltered by the oaks.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 617 Calle la Marjal
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 617 Calle la Marjal
description: Full land at the back of the sports park. Almost flat along a small path that passes.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 340 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Large parking lot to rest, asphalt road if you enter through the entrance that comes from Bocairent.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 10 Plaça Numero 21
description: Hermitage of Morera (Ontinyent). Quiet place to spend the night in contact with the rural environment. 7 km from the Natural Park of Pou Clar. Near the towns of Ontinyent and Fontanars dels Alforins.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 18 CV-795
description: Surrounded by nature on the road from Banyeres to Alcoy. information Center. a large natural car park with trees and many spaces, flat area. Without services

title: (46640) Moixent - 6 Carrer Passeig de l'Estació
description: Quiet, parking at the train station. Moixent is an area where you can visit the vineyards of the region of the Valencian Appellation Tuscany or places like "the grove". It is also an important Iberian village of La Bastide. Holidays the last week of August.

title: (03688) El Fondó de les Neus - Unnamed Road
title_short: (03688) El Fondó de les Neus - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area to spend the day with the family

title: (03680) Aspe - 40Ac Calle Lepanto
description: Free public parking, near the town center with services, you can sleep, cars are usually parked, it is very quiet

title: (03109) Castalla - Camino de Antenas
description: Pedro Paya antennas. Near the Maigmo. Fire watch post. 360 ° view spectacular. Paved access road in very good condition, although it has a lot of unevenness. Suitable for motorhomes.

title: (03680) Aspe - 17 Avenida Padre Ismael
description: Huge relatively quiet parking, no service ... but to spend a quiet night!

title: (03680) Alicante - 7 Plaça Poligono 46
description: Esplanade with trees and a picnic area within a park, it has a fountain and rubbish bins, quite flat. It is located next to a road but quiet at night, yes, lots of mosquitoes

title: (03698) - 84 Partida Escandella
description: In front of an (always?) abandoned military base. One hike at the foot of the mountain. Stayed here 4 nights without problems.

title: (03315) Fondó dels Frares - Unnamed Road
description: Super quiet place with magnificent view and the possibility of ballads on foot, mountain bike or motocross.

title: (46640) Mogente - 14 Calle Luis Jorques Gasso
description: Parking next to the football field, about 700 meters from the city center.

title: (30648) El Salado -
description: Quiet parking, at the foot of the track with easy access and close to the road. No services. Near the beginning of the hiking route of Las Pozas del Río Chicamo.

name: Camperplaats Het kartonnen huis
title: (03680) Camperplaats Het kartonnen huis
description:
Camperplaats The cardboard house known from Ik Vertrek.

An attractive and small-scale Camperplaats in Aspe to relax in a beautiful cycling and walking environment.

A beautiful location just outside the village of Aspe, located on the Campo surrounded by mountains.

Aspe center is easy to reach on foot, by bicycle or car. Aspe has many restaurants and supermarkets, the nearest supermarket is 2 kilometers from our house.

The friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention will quickly make you feel at home.

We have 4 spacious camper pitches (8x8 meters) that are not suitable for pets.

We have 6 spacious camper pitches (11x7 meters) between the olive trees that are suitable for pets. The olive trees provide shade for your pet. We also have a fenced in dog play area where the dog can run/run free where there is a rubbish bin with free poop bags.

NB
Campers no larger than 8 meters
Reservations can only be made by appointment
Pets allowed
Check-in from 12:00 PM and check-out is until 12:00 PM.

Sunday is a 'day off' for us, hence no check-in and check-out option.

title: (03680) Aspe - 99 Avenida Orihuela
description: Ample paved and level space to park next to the Aspe cemetery, a quiet place next to a supermarket, park and close to the town with all kinds of services.

name: The Solins, Rural Complex
title: (30629) The Solins, Rural Complex
description: El Solins Complejo Turisico! Cave houses, parking for campers, free wifi, restaurant, two swimming pools ...

title: (03680) - 12 Plaça Poligono 23
description: Alone in the world...

title: (02690) - 176 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Lugar tranquilo, sin luz, apartado de la carretera y casas

title: (30648) Ricabacica -
description: Magnificent place in the middle of the extremely quiet desert where we spent the night and in the morning a short walk on the summit where you have a crazy panorama. It is next to an abandoned house with access on a paved road

title: (02692) Pétrola - 27 Calle Olmo
description: Source for clean water recharge

title: (03689) Hondón de los Frailes -
description: A lovely abandoned quarry with great views.

title: (02499) Hellín - 7 Carretera Jumilla
description: Parking for dirt trucks, large, ideal to spend the night if you are caught in this area, 50m gas station, quiet moche with some cicada with insomnia.

title: (02692) Pétrola - Unnamed Road
description: Salt water bath. Impressive sunset. There is no service.

title: (03339) Marxant -
description: Land parking in the heart of the Sierra de Crevillent without any service but with stunning views at sunrise and tranquility at night. Access by dirt track in perfect condition and suitable for all types of vehicle. Ideal place to visit the San Cayetano Mountain Park and start one of the most classic hiking trails in the area.

title: (30629) Fortuna - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice corner with a beautiful view, without service.
climbing via ferrata near.

title: (30649) - 51 Diseminado los Baños
description: Parking for mobile homes and caravans with filling and emptying service for gray and black water. Wireless. To shower. Light. 1 km from the spa town of Leana (Fortuna). Possibility of seeing meals with the owners of the restaurant. ? Can only be booked on a monthly basis for 150 euros per month

title: (30649) Los Baños de Fortuna -
description: A beautiful place in the "desert". Directly at the Mirador Los Barrancos. Lots of options for standing and staying overnight. The path is not quite as good at the beginning, but it works. wonderful all-round view.

title: (46691) Vallada - 88 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Stop with the possibility of shade next to the gas station. It is not a good place to sleep because of the noise from the highway.

title: (30649) La Huerta -
description: Esplanade of land next to the track, in the middle of the Abanilla desert. It is accessed by the road from Baños de Fortuna to Mahoya, and the last kilometer is a dirt track in good condition, signposted as "Ruta la huerta-los barrancos". Close to the Leana Spa and the Chicano River Trail. The landscape is spectacular but there is no shade. **take the access road over the hill as the other access road has deep gulleys and you might get stuck**

title: (30629) Fortuna - 5 Camino Cueva
description:
Santuario Romano de la Cueva Negra

Nice picnic area for 10 motorhomes, grill places and stone tables. Beautiful caves above, tap water.

title: (46691) Vallada - 176 Plaça Poligono 5
description: Good quality drinking water for free.

name: Camping Los Banos de la Fuente
title: (30649) Camping Los Banos de la Fuente
title_short: (30649) Camping Los Banos de la Fuente
description: Campsite open all year. Swimming pool water at 36°C with hydromassage and massage showers. Supply and disposal in an area that is also suitable for large WoMo. Sanitary facilities with shared showers as well as individual showers. Catering available. The swimming pool must be paid extra.

title: (03340) Alicante -
description: Stop for the Rambla Salada hike. Several level outskirts. Very quiet night, no traffic.

title: (30649) Los Baños de Fortuna -
description: A desert-like place with very nice views and a walking route nearby, a few kilometers from a local village

title: (30626) Los Baños de Fortuna -
description:
Nice place in the desert of Abanilla. You can go along the path, there are several places where you can park.
It's better to push a bit further because at the beginning of the path, there are a couple of trashes (nothing that really spoils the place nor the scenery, but I prefer to warn ;)).
Beautiful, secluded place, but no shade and no service.

title: (03339) Crevillent -
description: Parking possibility for the climbing spots around. Nice and quiet place. Unfortunetely there was a lot of trash. We collected a bit and took it with us. Please leave the place clean and with responsibility.

title: (46810) Enguera - 31 CV-590
description: Enguera Ayora promenade with pine trees and picnic tables for a stop.

title: (30540) Blanca - 15 Calle San José
description: Parking at the side of the road with shade to make a stop and rest. I would not use it to sleep. Useful considering that we have barely found official rest areas on the nearby highway.

title: (03340) Albatera - 235 Partida Lomas Gp. 2
description:
Beautifully landscaped pitch in our garden, for max 2 campers up to 7.5 m,

with access to water electricity. toilet, washing machine and dryer, swimming pool, petanque court,
5 km from Mercadona and other shops and restaurants
 30 km from the sea or Alicante and Torrevieja (Santa Pola, La Marina) possibility to rent a car or scooter.

Mandatory notification by e-mail.

longer period negotiable on site.

title: (03339) Crevillent -
description: Very quite during the night, flat and with a little walk by the hill you will get a nice view on the lake. Nice for one night.

title: (30620) Fortuna - 28 Avenida Vicente Medina
description: Parking near Center for Child day care. Walking distance to center of Fortuna. Close to supermarket. Nice hiking possibilities in rural area.

title: (46620) Ayora - 69 Calle Manuel Reig
description: Urban environment, next to the road that goes from Almansa to Requena, at the entrance to the town, next to the ladder and with the Red Cross post.

title: (03330) Crevillent - 93 Carrer Barranc
description: We have spent the night here. Little crowded place. very well

name: Camperplaats El Nogal
title: (46620) Camperplaats El Nogal
description: Hello, we are Gerco and Nelly. We have a camper place in the beautiful Ayora Valley, quietly situated 2km from Ayora. The camper place is on a kind of lawn, you can also use the swimming pool, toilet, water and shower. The cassette can be emptied (without chemicals). You can drop off your rubbish in our rubbish bin.

title: (30530) Cieza - 14 Calle Juan de la Cierva
title_short: (30530) Cieza - 14 Calle Juan de la Cierva
description: Ample space to park and see the city. Buses and trucks. I imagine you can sleep

name: Càmping Les Palmeres
title: (03330) Càmping Les Palmeres
description: Camping Las Palmeras within a restaurant/hotel complex - quiet in this season, shaded - swimming pool - perfect for visiting Elche.

title: (30530) Cieza - Paseo Ribereno
description: Drinking water source. Next to the bathing area.

title: (30530) Cieza - Paseo Ribereno
description: Small parking in a quiet place beautiful surroundings to walk along the river, has no service.

title: (30530) Cieza - 18 Calle Calvario
description: Quiet parking in a nice place near the center

title: (03330) Polígon Industrial Catxapets - 13 Carrer Ibi
description: Place in a quiet and uncrowded area.

title: (46622) Teresa de Cofrentes - 5 N-330
description: Parking with several spaces next to the road, not many cars pass by and it is quiet

title: (30612) Ulea - N-301
description: Large parking in the picnic area. Ideal for spending the night or eating on the road. A little noise with the neighboring highway

title: (46623) Jarafuel - Unnamed Road
description: Flat spot in nature next to a gravel road. We slept here 1 night. On main road: when you turn in to this gravel road there is a big bump, so if you have a low van this place is not an option.
